mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT(PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CONTENT, PRICE, MEMBER_ID, CATEGORY_NO, AREA_ID) VALUES(SEQ_PRODUCT.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{productContent}, #{price}, #{memberId}, #{categoryNo}, #{areaId})
INSERT INTO PRODUCT_ATTA(ATTA_NO, PRODUCT_NO, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_LEVEL) VALUES(SEQ_PRODUCT_ATTA.NEXTVAL, SEQ_PRODUCT.CURRVAL, #{changeName}, #{fileLevel})
